answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
I haven't seen any examples of externships in local government. Lots in law or in the medical field. I have seen good examples of internal sabbaticals, exchange programs, and post-undergrad/post-graduate internships and Fellowships. If you can provide a little more detail on the kind of program you're considering (is it similar to externships in law) I can keep searching. 
The closest I could find is a job shadow for a day in Northern California: http://www.nextgensiliconvalley.org/Students.html#JobShadow

author: Mary Mullany
text:
The City of Richmond is considering expanding our Internship program to include hosting of Externships.
Does your locality currently host externs? If so, please share a copy of your externship policy or your SOP that includes this type of work study program.
Thanks,
Mary Mullany
HR Division Chief - Training & Development
City of Richmond
mary.mullany@richmondgov.com
title: Local Government Externship Policies
